thread.section_title: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand | acerentalcars.co.nz
thread.title: Jacques Simard
thread.title_full: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand reviewed by Jacques Simard

author: Jacques Simard
title: Jacques Simard
text: My wife and I have rented a Toyota Corolla from Ace Rental Cars for a 22-day tour of New Zealand. We picked the car at Auckland Airport and left it at Christchurch Airport at the end of our remarkable trip. Everything was perfect from start to finish. The shuttle bus from the airport to Ace took just a few minutes. The initial contact at Auckland gave us all the info we needed. The car was in perfect shape and stayed that way for the whole trip. And the shuttle bus from Ace at Chritschurch to the airport was also very quick with basically no waiting time. A+++
